users.name: Henry
users.description: I have large experience as a creative artist. I have participated in a number of exhibitions and created posters for stay plays or visuals for music festivals and more.

users.name: Sophia
users.description: I am an avid observer. Not only of paintings, but of interesting shapes and groupings in my visual field. From time to time, while waiting at a tramstop, an interesting combination of colours created by people standing in front of a door catches my eye.

users.name: Camila
users.description: With my hand and brush, I capture everything I feel at the moment on the canvas. I am able to work sensitively and in tune with my aesthetics and various feelings. My inspiration is my current feeling and mood, which is based on my Gemini sign. I perceive life intensively, intuitively, and fearlessly.

users.name: Violet
users.description: Violet is a landscape painter and nature is the major theme in her work. Her concern is not to show things how they are but to show the emotional experience of nature which allows some kind of abstraction of the depiction.

arts.title: Night City
arts.description: Artwork on supported wooden frame. Ready to hang. Framing on request.

arts.title: Little Bush
arts.description: Artwork on supported wooden frame. Ready to hang. Framing on request.

arts.title: Horse Race
arts.description: In this oil work, I celebrate vitality and movement through the frantic running of horses. Every brushstroke is full of passion. The bright colors capture the boundless energy of the competition, reflecting the joy and intensity of the moment. It will breathe contagious dynamism and a touch of liveliness into any living space.

arts.title: Himalaya
arts.description: In this oil work, I wanted to capture the very essence of the immensity and quiet force of nature. Playing with textures and a reduced palette, I express a raw beauty, where each brushstroke tells the dance between light and darkness. It brings powerful energy to your space, a constant reminder of the sublime harmony that exists beyond our everyday lives.

arts.title: Still Life
arts.description: In this work, I captured the fleeting beauty of a living bouquet, with passionate brushstrokes and expressive colors. Using oil for its richness, I seek to evoke the emotions and vitality of nature. Each touch brings energy and depth, bringing life to the space it inhabits. It is a celebration of life, both ephemeral and timeless, which resonates in the heart of the beholder.

arts.title: In voller Bl√ºte
arts.description: I have captured the essence of expressionism in my passionately created acrylic paintings. The vibrant colors and dynamic brushstrokes convey a feeling of growth and vibrancy, as if the colors are blooming directly from the image, filling the space with energy and joy. Every viewer should feel the vibrant power of nature and be enchanted by the beauty and emotional expression that I have left in every stroke.

arts.title: FIRES
arts.description: This painting was made in the summer of 2021 when painter was staying in South of France and a major series of fires came close to where he was staying.

arts.title: Diara
arts.description: strong portrait of a black woman who embodies a strong self-confidence. This work was painted with acrylic on canvas, which is stretched over a stretcher frame. The work is signed by the artist and comes with a certificate of authenticity.

arts.title: Old lily pond
arts.description: In my work I capture the vibrant energy of a pond interspersed with water lilies. I use acrylic paints to create a composition that combines expressionistic feelings with impressionistic techniques, creating a semi-abstract interpretation of the beauty of nature. This painting will bring an atmosphere of contemplation and natural harmony to your home.

arts.title: Soft light
arts.description: In my work I experimented with acrylic paints to create a deep emotional experience. The abstract, expressionistic and impressionistic composition merges into a semi-abstract landscape that expresses feelings of calm, hope and the infinity of nature. The warm earth colors and cooler sky tones invite you to dream and bring a harmonious energy to any room.
